attributes.action: Ask that the Government keep the amount of GM food in non-GM food to 0.1% of food content and not rasie the allowed amount to 0.9%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government is proposing that the amount of GM food permissable in non GM Food be raised from 0.1% (negligable) to 0.9%.  This should not be allowed, sio that those of us who do not wish to eat GM Food can continue not to do so.
